MODULE.name: SmartCradle
MODULE.HELP_OVERVIEW: The SmartCradle API is used to set and retrieve attributes of the MC18 Cradle

PROPERTIES.DESC: The following properties configure the Smart Cradle API

PROPERTY.name: chargeState
PROPERTY.DESC: Sets the charge state of the cradle. Values can be either 'Fast' or 'Slow'.

VALUE.DESC: The cradle will charge devices quickly.
The cradle will charge devices slowly.

PROPERTY.name: rowId
PROPERTY.DESC: The current Row ID of the cradle in the matrix

PROPERTY.name: columnId
PROPERTY.DESC: The current Column ID of the cradle in the matrix

PROPERTY.name: wallId
PROPERTY.DESC: The current Wall ID of the cradle in the matrix

PROPERTY.name: mfgDate
PROPERTY.DESC: Manufacture date of the cradle in DD-MM-YY format

METHOD.name: unlock
METHOD.DESC: Unlocks the terminal from the cradle for the specified period

PARAM.name: ledOnDuration
PARAM.DESC: During unlock the LEDs will flash, this is the on duration of that flash specified in milliseconds. Set to 0 to prevent flashing and keep the LED off.

PARAM.name: ledOffDuration
PARAM.DESC: During unlock the LEDs will flash, this is the off duration of that flash specified in milliseconds. Set to 0 to prevent flashing. If the on duration is non-zero and this parameter is zero then the LED will remain on when unlocked.

PARAM.name: timeout
PARAM.DESC: The cradle will remain unlocked for the length of time in seconds specified by this value. Specified in seconds. Range 10 to 30 inclusive.

REMARK.title: Flashing the Cradle LEDs
REMARK.DESC: There is a hardware imposed limit to how quickly the cradle LEDs can be flashed for a quickly flashing LED it is recommended to set the on / off duration to 500ms.
